text: @bgluckman I'm very sorry for your loss. For people unconvinced about the seriousness of COVID19, a Radiologist friend said he has seen serious lung and heart damage on scans even when people showed minimal outward symptoms! This damage could be permanent. We don't know enough. Wear a mask.
